mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, phone_number, address, authority, name, last_login_time, last_logout_time, register_token, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{phone_number}, #{address}, #{authority}, #{name}, #{last_login_time}, #{last_logout_time}, #{register_token}, #{is_deleted}, #{created_at}, #{updated_at})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, phone_number = #{phone_number}, address = #{address}, authority = #{authority}, name = #{name}, last_login_time = #{last_login_time}, last_logout_time = #{last_logout_time}, register_token = #{register_token}, is_deleted = #{is_deleted}, created_at = #{created_at}, updated_at = #{updated_at} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
